tuv.prop: <seg>Earth is the third planet from the Sun, and the densest and fifth-largest of the eight planets in the Solar System.</seg>
<seg>It is sometimes referred to as the world, the Blue Planet, or by its Latin name, Terra.</seg>
tuv.seg: It is also the largest of the Solar System's four terrestrial planets.
Она является также крупнейшей среди планет земной группы.

tuv.prop: <seg>It is also the largest of the Solar System's four terrestrial planets.</seg>
<seg>Earth formed approximately 4.54 billion years ago, and life appeared on its surface within one billion years.</seg>
tuv.seg: It is sometimes referred to as the world, the Blue Planet, or by its Latin name, Terra.
Иногда упоминается как мир, Голубая Планета, или Латинское имя - Терра.
